1.png.description: The helmet from the Halo videogame is partially visible on the right side of the bookshelf. Moving right will bring it more into view and closer to the center of the frame.

2.png.description: The helmet from the Halo videogame is visible on the bookshelf, slightly to the left of the center. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

3.png.description: The helmet is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will bring it more into view and closer to the center.

4.png.action: go up 1 meter — bad action - lost target
4.png.description: The helmet from the Halo videogame is partially visible on the right side of the bookshelf. Moving up will help center the object in the frame and bring it closer.
The helmet from the Halo videogame is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will bring it more into view and closer to the center.

5.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
5.png.description: The target object, the Helmet from Halo, is not visible in the current image.

6.png.description: The helmet from the Halo videogame is visible on the bookshelf. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.

7.png.description: The helmet is visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will bring it closer and more centered in the frame.

8.png.description: The helmet from the Halo videogame is visible on the right side of the image, sitting on a shelf. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.
